channel.title: CVE Feed for Creative Themes HQ -- Blocksy

item.title: CVE-2024-31382|2024-08-02T01:52:56.552Z -- creative%20themes%20hq -- blocksy
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Creative Themes HQ Blocksy.This issue affects Blocksy: from n/a through 2.0.22.

item.title: CVE-2024-32961|2024-06-04T17:51:50.751Z -- creative%20themes%20hq -- blocksy
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Creative Themes HQ Blocksy allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Blocksy: from n/a through 2.0.33.
